effect.sword_shield: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.
effect.legends_arceus: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.

short_effect.sword_shield: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if there is any able to battle. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.
